title: Ankylosing Spondylitis
content:
* A few simple stretching exercises in the evening before going to bed may improve your sleep.


####    
Eat a balanced diet
Although there is no scientific evidence that diet has an effect on AS, a balanced diet helps maintain general health and energy levels. Read more about[healthy eating](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/h/healthy-eating-basics "Healthy eating")
